name: dog poncho
notes:
this is a crochet pattern for an easy dog poncho. follow along with the pattern, written in sizes xxs through 2xl, to make your dog the perfect poncho. 

this is an excellent design for dogs with mobility issues because there's only one hoe for the head. no armholes! what a stylish, chic pattern!

use a 100% acrylic yarn in a size 2/sport weight with a 4.5mm crochet hook.
